products.name: Bacca Bucci Jump Shoe
products.overview: Bacca Bucci Jump Gym Shoes offer padded insoles for comfort, non-slip grip, and breathable material, making them perfect for running, training, and weightlifting. Available in Black:Orange, Black:White, and Blue.
products.long_description: Upgrade your workout with Bacca Bucci Jump Gym Shoes—designed for comfort, durability, and performance. Featuring padded insoles, a non-slip outsole, and a lightweight, breathable build, these shoes provide excellent support for running, training, and weightlifting. Available in multiple sizes (UK 06-12) and stylish colors. Get yours at 50% off!

products.name: boAt Rockerz 650 Pro
products.overview: boAt Rockerz 650 Pro delivers powerful sound, seamless Bluetooth connectivity, and long battery life for an immersive audio experience. Designed for comfort with soft ear cushions and a lightweight build.
products.long_description: Experience premium sound with boAt Rockerz 650 Pro, featuring deep bass, crystal-clear audio, and long-lasting battery life for non-stop music. With Bluetooth connectivity, ergonomic design, and soft ear cushions, it ensures all-day comfort. Perfect for music lovers and gamers, this stylish headset is built for high-quality sound and durability.

products.name: Fruit and Nuts Gift Hampers Pack of 6
products.overview: A premium Fruit and Nuts Gift Hamper (Pack of 6) filled with high-quality dry fruits and nuts, perfect for gifting on special occasions.
products.long_description: Treat your loved ones to a luxurious Fruit and Nuts Gift Hamper (Pack of 6), featuring a selection of premium dry fruits and nuts for a healthy and delicious treat. Perfect for festivals, celebrations, and corporate gifting, this elegantly packaged hamper is a thoughtful way to share taste and nutrition.

products.name: Holiday Cookie Box
products.overview: A delightful Holiday Cookie Box filled with freshly baked, assorted cookies, perfect for festive celebrations and gifting.
products.long_description: Celebrate the season with a Holiday Cookie Box, featuring a delicious assortment of crispy, chewy, and buttery cookies in festive flavors. Perfect for gifting, sharing, or indulging, this beautifully packaged box brings warmth and sweetness to every holiday moment.

products.name: Ferrero Rocher Premium Milk Chocolate (300g)
products.overview: Indulge in Ferrero Rocher Premium Milk Chocolate (300g)—a luxurious blend of crispy wafer, creamy hazelnut filling, and rich milk chocolate, perfect for gifting or treating yourself.
products.long_description: Experience the irresistible taste of Ferrero Rocher Premium Milk Chocolate (300g). Each piece features a crunchy wafer shell, smooth hazelnut filling, and a delicate milk chocolate coating with finely chopped hazelnuts. Ideal for special occasions, celebrations, or personal indulgence, this elegantly packaged treat is a symbol of fine taste and premium quality.

products.name: Blue lays
products.overview: Enjoy the bold and spicy Lay’s India’s Magic Masala potato chips, packed with a unique blend of Indian spices for an irresistible crunch.
products.long_description: Savor the flavorful and crunchy experience of Lay’s India’s Magic Masala potato chips, crafted with a perfect mix of spicy, tangy, and savory Indian spices. Each bite delivers an explosion of taste, making it the perfect snack for anytime cravings, parties, or movie nights.
